about_the_game:
"Secrets of the Heartbeat" is a real-life video interactive game. You, who were originally a nobody, suddenly reach the pinnacle of your life. While you have achieved great success in your career, your love has also reached its peak. Faced with four beauties with different styles, which one will you choose as your true love?

  • 1、Gentle and lovely secretary

  • 2、Mature and independent anchor

  • 3、Actresses with contrasting aloofness and coldness

  • 4、Young and lively girl

Feature Of Product

  • Shot from a first-person perspective, a completely immersive experience.
  • Ultra-clear 4K image quality, film and television grade lens composition.
  • No need for complicated strategies, just follow your heart and make your choice.
  • Rich and interesting easter egg characters are waiting for you to unlock!

Say something off topic

The world is a big place, but sometimes it’s hard to accommodate us little ones. He is obviously an adult, but he is full of fear of the outside world, sealing his true self in the inner prison. We long for warmth, for hugs, for conversation and laughter. But it’s hard for us to take the first step. I spent many late nights nestled under the quilt, scrolling through my phone, not knowing who to send a message to.
I hope this game can bring some comfort to people in loneliness, and I hope you can experience a little warmth and fun here.

short_description: Confronted with life's peak, diverse romance beckons. Do you choose the allure of a charming secretary or the wisdom of an independent yoga instructor? Will you pursue distant celebrities or seek the sincerity of a working girl's love? Each choice shapes your journey.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean, Indonesian, Thai
*languages with full audio support
